overview:
Dr Mark K. Smith is the founder and CEO of ipadio.

Having begun his career in digital publications in the early 1990’s Mark was credited with inventing the concept of online conferencing and that first business was floated on the London Stock Exchange in the year 2000.

Markâ€™s next business â€“ Nemisys Enterprises Ltd was founded late in 2001, this digital agency specialises in building complex websites and related services for the not-for-profit sector and is especially active in sport.

Ipadio, the live telephone to web service is a spin out from Nemisys and enables users to broadcast live to the internet from any telephone. Phone blog, collect audio data, record and update the world, or simply let your mates know what you’re doing - ipadio is integrated with Social Media & Blogging platforms.
